medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 12 hours prior to presentation, with onset occurring 2 hours after eating scallops. The patient has not experienced this type of pain before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation on coumadin, gout, bilateral cataracts s/p surgical repair, hyperlipidemia, ischemic strokes with residual right sided weakness, hypertension.
medical_history.family_history: Sister has dementia, hx of breast CA in sister. No family history of stroke.
